summary: WHEN THE VEHICLE ENGINE WARMS UP.  CONSUMER STATES THAT THE BRAKES START SMOKING AND CONSUMER CAN SMELL RUBBER BURNING. CONSUMER STATES ONCE THE BRAKE PEDAL BECAME VERY STIFF WHEN APPLYING THE BRAKES.  TOOK TO DELAER AND THEY REPLACED FRONT WHEEL AND AXLE.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION.
